---
id: query-group-member-list
title: "Query group member list"
description: "Get the user list in a group based on the group ID."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Query group member list</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Get the user list in a group based on the group ID.

<Note title="Note">The group ID can be obtained through [Query the group list in the App](/zim-server/group/query-group-list-in-the-app).</Note>

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request

Only supports numbers, English characters, and '!','#','$','%','&','(',')','+',' -',':',';','<','=','.','>','?','@','[',']','^','_','{','}','|','~'.","maxLength":32,"example":"groupA"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Limit"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 1000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Number of members to retrieve at once, with a value range of [0, 1000], meaning this API can return a maximum of 1,000 members per call.\n\nWhen the number of members in the group exceeds the Limit, you need to call this API multiple times <b>and the Limit must remain consistent</b>.\n\nIf empty or greater than 1,000, the default value is 1,000.\n","minimum":0,"maximum":1000,"example":1000}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Next"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Pagination flag. Fill in 0 for the first time, and then fill in the Next value returned last time.\n\nFor example, if there are 2,500 members in the group, when calling this API to query the group member list:\n\n- First call: Set Limit to 1,000 and Next to 0 to query members 1 to 1,000; the Next value in the returned result is 1.\n- Second call: Set Limit to 1,000 and Next to 1 to query members 1,001 to 2,000; the Next value in the returned result is 2.\n- Third call: Set Limit to 1,000 and Next to 2 to query members 2,001 to 2,500; the query is complete, and the Next value in the returned result is 0.\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
